#summary Known Limitations of the Flowplayer Open Ad Streamer
#sidebar TableOfContents

The following limitations in functionality exist for this release:
  
  * The Open Ad Streamer is not compatible with the Flowplayer Subtitles Plugin
  * A modified version of the Flowplayer playlist plugin is required to hide OVA "ad" streams from the playlist

For more information on the restrictions, planned enhancements and currently outstanding defects, please review the [http://code.google.com/p/open-video-ads/issues/list Issues log]
